org.contentmine.image.pixel

Class PixelPlotter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.contentmine.image.pixel.PixelPlotter

  • public class PixelPlotter
extends java.lang.Object
    plots Pixel objects such as PixelList, PixelIsland, PixelGraph. Manages colours, width, filenames, etc.
    Author:
    pm286
